posts.post_content:
Hey all, looking for a lower graded example of Hal Chase Blue Portrait with Cycle back. Have some tradebait and i could do cash and trade as well. Most of the trade has appeal despite their flaws. thanks for looking. Apologies in advance for my scanner :P  [url]dg480@yahoo.com[/url]

Chase Blue Tolstoi (SGC 10)

Abbaticchio Brown (Fr-Gd) wrinkles, pencil on back
Ames At Chest (Gd) crease, touches of paper loss and slight staining on back
Beaumont (Vg appearence) glue with paper attached on back w/heavy wrinkle
Bates (Vg) minor wrinkling
Bransfield (Vg) touched corners, no creases/wrinkling that i can see
Burch Bat (Fr-Gd) corner wear, creasing and wrinkling
Doyle Polar Bear (Gd-Vg) small vertical crease from wrist to shoulder
Egan (Poor) 
Ewing (Fr-GD) name on top, wrinkles w/crinkle
Jones Port. (Gd) wrinkling
Kruger (Poor)
Moran Tolstoi (Fr-Gd) corner crease and corner wear
Murphy Bat (Vg-VgEx) diamond cut no creases/wrinkles
Murray Bat (Vg) chip next to mouth

T205 Wiltse Hassan (Vgish) faint spider wrinkle thru "nationals"
